item.title: Trump picking Kevin Warsh as Fed chair wasn’t enough to soothe shaky markets
item.description: A double-whammy selloff of tech stocks and metals shook markets on Friday.

item.title: ‘I’m worried about cash flow’: I’m 71 with a $2.7 million IRA and $470K in stocks. Why can’t I relax?
item.description: “My home is paid for and has an estimated value of $700,000.”

item.title: My untrustworthy and selfish brother is executor of our family estate. How do I stop him from cheating us?
item.description: “I am the third trustee appointed to my late parents’ trust.”
